hero.title: FAQ
hero.subtitle: A question? We probably already have the answer.

questions.question: What is a KYA-SoP?
questions.answer: It is an intelligent and locally assembled solar power system by KYA, designed to efficiently meet the energy needs in rural and urban areas.

questions.question: What does the KYA-SolDesign software do?
questions.answer: KYA-SolDesign is a software for sizing and simulating solar photovoltaic systems.

questions.question: What are the advantages of a KYA solar system?
questions.answer: The advantages are numerous: energy autonomy, reduction of electricity bills, use of a clean and sustainable energy source, etc.

questions.question: Do solar panels need maintenance?
questions.answer: Yes, regular maintenance is recommended to ensure optimal performance. This includes cleaning the panels and checking the components.

questions.question: Are solar solutions accessible to everyone?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer financing solutions and support to make our solar systems accessible to as many people as possible.

questions.question: Do you take care of the installation?
questions.answer: Yes, our team of qualified technicians takes care of the complete installation of your solar system.

questions.question: Are there any aids or subsidies?
questions.answer: Depending on your country and your situation, there may be government aid or subsidies for the installation of solar systems.

questions.question: What is the lifespan of a solar system?
questions.answer: A well-maintained solar system can have a lifespan of over 25 years.

questions.question: What is the warranty on your products?
questions.answer: We offer a warranty on our products. The duration of the warranty varies depending on the components of the system.

questions.question: How can I contact you?
questions.answer: You can contact us via the contact form on our website, by email, or by phone.

questions.question: Do KYA solar systems work in the event of a power outage?
questions.answer: Yes, our systems can be equipped with batteries to store energy and provide you with electricity in the event of a power outage.
